author: Like Stories of Old

About this video essay: 
After a lifetime of exploring cinema, I brought together the 50 movies that most profoundly impacted my worldview, my beliefs, and of which I can genuinely say that they changed my life for the better.

0:00 The Set-Up
1:50 Part I: Existence

17:34 The Turin Horse
21:10 Part II: Time and Memory
21:45 8,5
25:47 The Mirror

33:39 The Assassinatio
title: The 50 Most Life-Changing Movies Ever Made
